siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

prevPage.excerpt: A shirt design to celebrate Facebook's  React framework  hitting 50,000 Github stars. The React development team contacted me to help design a shirt. They were approaching 50,000 stars 💫 on Github and wanted to commemorate with a limited-edition…

nextPage.excerpt: A distinctive speedometer illustration for the Google Chrome team.
